successes.title: Hendo Hoverboards - World's first REAL hoverboard
successes.description: Hendo is introducing the world's first REAL hoverboard and hover developer kit. We are putting hover technology in YOUR hands.

Pledges.description: PROPS TO YOU, KIND SIR OR MADAM:  We'll give you a shout out on the social media venue of your choice and list your name on our website's grand scroll of hoverheros.
A STICKER AND A MAGNET:  Let the world know you are a part of this.  Perfect for your car and other soon-to-be-replaced-by-hover conveyances.
AWESOME T-SHIRT:  Design not yet finalized - we've got a few great ideas (Hoverboards will be possible when pigs fly...hmmm) but we want to hear yours!

NAME ETCHED INTO OUR HOVERPARK:  Send us your name, short message or a company logo and we'll make you a part of history.  We'll etch it into our Hendo Hoverpark surface.  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.

HENDO HOVERBOARD RIDE:  A 5 minute hoverboard ride just to get a feel for it.  This can be redeemed at our Silicon Valley area location, or potentially at a hoverpark near you in the future.  We can start offering rides in March 2015, however we will need reservations a month in advance.  More details to follow for the backers!  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.

LEVITATING HOVERBOARD DISPLAY:  We call it our "Beta-board".  Long story about the name, but more importantly its our concept production hoverboard on an appropriately levitating display.  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.

THE WHITEBOX™ DEVELOPER KIT:  A Hendo hover engine set, and enough surface to hover it on.  All yours to marvel at.  You can even remove the engines and try hovering something of your own design and, beyond that, come up with other novel uses for Magnetic Field Architecture (MFA™).  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.

WHITEBOX™ WITH A SKIN:  Same awesome hover engines, but with a nicely designed skin for your viewing enjoyment.  More skins to follow, and let us know your ideas!  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.

FULL-SIZED REPLICA HENDO HOVERBOARD:  Display it how you like - prominently on a wall, proudly on a stand, just don't throw it in the basement or attic!  Note that there are no hover engines in it!  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.
***EARLY ADOPTERS*** THE WHITEBOX+™ :  Same hover engine system as the regular Whitebox, but with an app for propulsion and control.  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.
***EARLY ADOPTERS TIER 2*** THE WHITEBOX+™ :  Same hover engine system as the regular Whitebox, but with an app for propulsion and control.  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.
***EARLY ADOPTERS TIER 3*** THE WHITEBOX+™ :  Same hover engine system as the regular Whitebox, but with an app for propulsion and control.  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.
THE WHITEBOX+™ :  Same hover engine system as the regular Whitebox, but with an app for propulsion and control.  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.

THE WHITEBOX+™ WITH A SKIN: If white is a bit too drab for you, spruce it up with a skin for some added personality.  More skins to follow, and let us know what you want to see!  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.

COACH AND RIDE: An extended hoverboard ride with one hour of private coaching by team Hendo hoverboarders.  Must be redeemed at our facility in Silicon Valley.  We can start offering these sessions in March and require one month of advance notice to plan.  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.

VIP PASS TO OUR 10/21/2015 EVENT:  All-access pass with lots of Hoverboard time.  You'll get a chance to rub elbows with some famous people and eat the great food in the back.  You can even schmooze behind the scenes with the Hendo creative team.  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo.

MEET THE HENDO TEAM:  Be part of the inspiration and vision by immersing yourself with the Hendo Hoverboard team.  Get one-on-ones with Greg, Engineers, and Tippi (our office dog!).  We'll fly you roundtrip, put you in a hotel for two nights and show you around town as well.  We can start these in March, and will need you to reserve at least two months in advance.  Also, we can only fly you from a US airport.  You will also get a T-Shirt and Sticker/Magnet Combo, VIP access to our Hover event on 10/21/2015, and I'm sure a bunch of other cool stuff from Hendo/Arx Pax HQ.

THE HENDO HOVERBOARD:  All yours - you will own one of the world's first 10 production hoverboards.  Smile widely as you glide past scores of envious faces.  You will be presented the hoverboard at our 10/21/2015 event, where you will have VIP access (well, you'll actually be a VIP).  However, you can also come to Hendo HQ to pick it up in person after that date, or we will arrange to have it delivered to you.  And yes, of course you get a T-Shirt and Magnets/Stickers as well.
